alert.note: Alert for Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Guadalupe County; Quay County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued October 12 at 1:31PM MDT until October 12 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 40 to 50 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...Guadalupe County, Quay County, and Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass. * WHEN...Until 7 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.

area.areaDesc: Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Guadalupe County; Quay County
